#summary How to install and run on Windows.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

  * [http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/winboard/winboard-4_2_7a.exe Download] and run the !WinBoard installer.  Follow the on-screen instructions.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gray-matter/downloads/list Download] a copy of a windows executable and put it into !WinBoard's directory.
  * Run !WinBoard.  In the *{{{WinBoard Startup}}}* window, replace the first *{{{GNUChess}}}* with the name of your executable like so:

[http://gray-matter.googlecode.com/files/WinBoard.jpg]

You can play against grayMatter or set it against GNUChess or other (preferably weaker) engines you may have installed.  Have fun!  :-)
